title: Credit Card Approvals Rates Vary by State
summary: This article explores how the geographic location of both merchants and customers can significantly impact credit card transaction approval rates. A survey of over one billion transactions revealed that state-level variations exist, with geography being a factor in determining transaction risk scores and leading to false declines.
key_points: Credit card approval rates vary by state.
Geography of merchant and consumer impacts transaction approval.
False declines are common and can be recovered.
Over one billion transactions were analyzed to determine these findings.
